text: 1:13 Mat 10:2-4; Mrk 3:16-19; Luk 6:14-16Makhoina sahar aduda thunglabada, makhoina leiramba mathakki ka aduda kakhatlammi. Maduda yaobasing adudi Peter, John, Jacob, Andrew, Philip, Thomas, Bartholomew, Matthew, Alphaeus-ki machanupa Jacob, mareibak ningba Simon amasung Jacob-ki machanupa Judas-ni.
